requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher (officially supported). Debian and Debian-like distros, Archlinux and Arch-like distros are also supported
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Storage: 171 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The current release is not Steam Deck compatible; we're working on it. Other than that, any computer from the last 5 years or so should have no problem running One Night in Kawami.

Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 171 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any computer from the last 5 years or so should have no problem running One Night in Kawami.

  • Graphics: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 171 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any computer from the last 5 years or so should have no problem running One Night in Kawami.
